member.name: T:MemBus.Subscribing.SubscriptionShaperAggregate
member.summary: Subsequent adds form a matroschka from inner to outer

member.name: M:MemBus.Subscribing.SubscriptionShaperAggregate.AddNextToInner(MemBus.Subscribing.ISubscriptionShaper)
member.summary: Add a shape next to the inner one. It is allowed to pass null. In this case, nothing is added

member.name: T:MemBus.Configurators.RichClientFrontend
member.summary: Setup the Bus with this on the UI thread (Important!). A parallel publisher is used that publishes messages in parallel but blocks until all message processing is done. Exceptions will not stop the publishing and become available on the bus as message. The setup allows you to call when doing a subscription.

member.name: T:MemBus.Configurators.AsyncRichClientFrontend
member.summary: Setup the Bus with this on the UI thread (Important!). A parallel publisher is used that publishes messages in parallel. With this setup does NOT block. Exceptions will become available once all subscriptions are done processing the message as message. This setup allows you to call when doing a subscription.

member.name: T:MemBus.Configurators.AsyncConfiguration
member.summary: A parallel publisher is used that publishes messages in parallel. With this setup does NOT block. Exceptions will become available once all subscriptions are done processing the message as message.

member.name: T:MemBus.Configurators.Conservative
member.summary: Sets up a SequentialPublisher, and a table based resolver. The message push process is interrupted when an exception is raised by a subscription.

member.name: T:MemBus.Configurators.IoCSupport
member.summary: Add ServiceLocator Support

member.name: M:MemBus.Configurators.IoCSupport.#ctor(MemBus.IocAdapter)
member.summary: Add an IoCadapter that will be used to resolve subscriptions. subscriptions will be resolved based on the interface

member.name: T:MemBus.Support.ApiAttribute
member.summary: Used to mark methods or classes to be useful in the context of an available API. This is useful for NDepend code analysis to mark items that could be private as they do not seem to be used

member.name: T:MemBus.Publishing.FireAndForgetPublisher
member.summary: Publisher of messages for maximum througput. If any exceptions occur, they will not be honoured in any way.

member.name: T:MemBus.Subscribing.FlexibleSubscribeAdapter
member.summary: Add this through the to your configuration to support subscribing objects with the , overload.

member.name: M:MemBus.Subscribing.FlexibleSubscribeAdapter.ByMethodName(System.String)
member.summary: Look at an object and look for methods with the provided name. The method must be void and accept a single parameter

member.name: M:MemBus.Subscribing.FlexibleSubscribeAdapter.ByInterface(System.Type)
member.summary: Look at an object and check it for interfaces. An interface should adhere to the following rules: Interface should define only one void method with a single parameter. The interface may be generic and can be implemented multiple times.
